text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Brian, the Gen Flynn story IS more important than your reporting of Covid-19 because it exposed ALL of your “reliable sources” as liars.  The fact that you’re doubling down with “Hoax: book of more lies” makes any Covid coverage from you dangerous.
